title: WTB - John Frill AB, Cycle or Old Mill
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB - John Frill AB, Cycle or Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Looking for a John Frill with American Beauty, Cycle or Old Mill back.  Not really picky on condition, but would prefer minimal paper loss.  Graded or raw is fine does not matter to me.

Can pay cash or have limited amount of T206 cards that I could trade if you prefer.

If you have one available you can either PM me or email me @ [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks,
Steve
